body_html:
This is because you built with --config=opt, it will try to build with whatever your machine arch seems to return. So I recommend trying with omitting --config=opt. Please note that -c opt and --config=opt are different.

For skipping android settings, cc @angersson

For skipping android settings, cc @angersson
body:
This is because you built with `--config=opt`,  it will try to build with whatever your machine arch seems to return. So I recommend trying with omitting `--config=opt`. Please note that `-c opt` and `--config=opt` are different.

For skipping android settings, cc @angersson
